definition: abbr. for 男子足球 men's soccer/abbr. for 男子足球隊|男子足球队 men's soccer team
male/Baron, lowest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The Chinese news media often report on the flashy lives that many soccer players apparently lead.
sentences.chinese: 中國媒體常常報道男足球員的花天酒地的生活。

sentences.english: Very low. There are many shortcomings of Chinese football.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲很低，中國男足有許多不足之處。

sentences.english: By the way, the Chinese national football team hurt me many times and deprived my interest in this game.
sentences.chinese: 中國男足的糟爛表現也使我對這項運動失去了興趣。

sentences.english: Our soccer team won the gold medal in martial arts.
sentences.chinese: 男足在武術項目上贏得兩枚獎牌。

sentences.english: After the game, Wu Nai, head of the boys' team, was very unhappy.
sentences.chinese: 比賽結束後，男足隊的隊長，吳楠很不開心。

definition: soccer association/soccer federation/abbr. for 足球協會|足球协会[zu2 qiu2 xie2 hui4]
men's volleyball/abbr. for 男子排球
women's volleyball/abbr. for 女子排球
Asian Football Confederation/abbr. for 亞洲足球聯合會|亚洲足球联合会[Ya4 zhou1 Zu2 qiu2 Lian2 he2 hui4]
Super Cup (various sports)/Super Bowl (American football championship game)
Sun Jihai (1977-), Chinese footballer, played for Manchester City (2002-2008)
host/official host (e.g. venue for games or a conference)
